trends: There have been no other sightings in Hammond
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: HOVERING OVER A WEATHER LIGHT, LOOKED LIKE A CUSTER OF STARS, BUT IT WAS TO LOW IN THE SKY, MOVER SLOW THEN FASTER & DISSAPPEARED
divs: sighting detailsi got up in the middle of the night, i live on the 7th floor i kept my blinds open at night to look at the sky, i been here a year and never seen any thing but stars, last night or this this morning 06\14\13 i got up to use the bathroom, i notice whhat i thought was a star, it was blinking like a custer of star, but it was to low in the sky for a star. it was hovering over one of those pole for weather or police station i do not know what thay are for, during the day the light flash white and at night thay flash red, so above it was this cluster of lights that didn't move , so i arranged my pillow on the bed to watch it started to move very slow, i could not believe my eyes then a bit faster, and all at once gone, that is my story.
